content.rendered:
Case management includes coordinating interventions and support efforts across campus and community resources to assist students who are facing crises, experiencing life stressors, and encountering barriers that impede success.

The SOS team may:

  • Reach out to students and connect them to appropriate resources on- and off-campus
  • Maintain contact and meet with students to address needs
  • Assist student who have recently been discharged from a hospital due to a behavioral health concern
  • Provide training to the Leo community on the management, response and interventions for assisting students in distress
How to Receive Case Management Support

You may contact the SOS team by calling (909) 448-4045 or emailing sos@laverne.edu. Reasons to connect include:

  • If you are a student looking to make an appointment on your behalf
  • If you are a faculty or staff seeking consultation regarding a student of concern
